message.content: You're confusing me. How did we get snippets? This is frustrating.
We mined candidate segments first, then used an LLM to structure them.

message.content: We should add jq to the base image or avoid jq usage.
We should run an ablation to see if chunk size affects recall.
I opened an incident report about this failure.
